articles.title: App crash on startup (Windows)
articles.content: If the app crashes on startup: 1) Clear cache (App data directory); 2) Reinstall app; 3) Update graphics drivers; 4) Check logs at %APPDATA%/MyApp/logs. If it persists, attach logs to a support ticket.

articles.title: Network timeout & 504 errors
articles.content: 504/502 errors often mean upstream service is slow. Try: 1) Retry after 30 seconds; 2) Check network connection; 3) If persistent, collect request timestamp and send logs for debugging.

articles.title: Performance troubleshooting
articles.content: If the app/site is slow: 1) Clear cache; 2) Test in Incognito; 3) Check CPU/RAM usage; 4) Try a different network; 5) Provide steps to reproduce for further investigation.
